resources.string: Signing in failed. Check internet connection.
Couldn`t start signing in with Google.
No Google Accounts found. Check internet.
Signing in with Google canceled by user.
There is no user with this email address. Register or login using one of the methods below.
The email address is already in use by another account.
The password is invalid or you does not have a password. Press \"Forgot password?\"
Access to this account has been temporarily disabled due to many failed login attempts. You can immediately restore it by resetting your password or you can try again later.
There is no user corresponding to the given email address.
Too many authorization cancellations via Google, the system blocked them for 24h. To restore dial the combination *#*#66382723#*#* in your phone.
Logging out failed. Check your connection.
